lead_paragraph: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce has said there is a chance defender Emmanuel Eboue could still get back into the squad but only if the Ivorian can get his one-year ban lifted in the next few days.

headline.print_headline: Allardyce Leaves Door Open for Eboue in Hope of Quick Fix
headline.main: Allardyce Leaves Door Open for Eboue in Hope of Quick Fix

snippet: Sunderland manager Sam Allardyce has said there is a chance defender Emmanuel Eboue could still get back into the squad but only if the Ivorian can get his one-year ban lifted in the next few days....
